articles.title: Europe will not allow attacks, says France, after Trump Greenland threat - BBC.com
articles.description: The EU's two leading members were reacting to the US president-elect's plans to acquire Denmark's autonomous territory.
articles.content:
Germany and France have warned Donald Trump against threatening Greenland, after the US president-elect refused to rule out using military force to seize Denmark's autonomous territory.
